question: For the past year or so, my big toe would go numb for a few days; to the point that i can stick a needle into the cuticle surrounding the toe and not feel it.  Recently ( 3 weeks or so) i've noticed an almost unbearable burning sensation with pressure resulting in having to walk with all pressure on the opposite side of my foot and none on the left side where my big toe is.  This is only in one foot.  Any suggestions you can offer would be most appreciated.  Please not that my grandfather did have and passed away from diabetes.  Which type i'm not sure.Thank you,Kristy
title: numbness
